short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Schedule on-site days, book or cancel a desk reservation, or invite & pre-register guests. Changes made will sync in GCal & Envoy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help your reception team prepare for your visitors by syncing Google Calendar events with Envoy. You will be able to select the location and visitor type for the given event.  Now, you can also schedule to come into the office and reserve desks all within Google Calendar.
